original_text:
Then they will take up a lament concerning you and say to you:
“‘How you are destroyed, city of renown,
    peopled by men of the sea!
You were a power on the seas,
    you and your citizens;
you put your terror
    on all who lived there.
korean_text: 그들이 너를 위하여 슬픈 노래를 불러 이르기를 항해자가 살았던 유명한 성읍이여 너와 너의 주민이 바다 가운데에 있어 견고하였도다 해변의 모든 주민을 두렵게 하였더니 어찌 그리 멸망하였는고

sentences.original_text: Then they will take up a lament concerning you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너를 위하여 애가를 불러 올 것이며

sentences.original_text: How you are destroyed, city of renown,
peopled by men of the sea!
You were a power on the seas,

sentences.korean_translation: 거기 사는 모든 자에게 두게 하였도다
